channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-26515] RetryingExecutorTest. testDiscardOnTimeout failed on azure
item.description:

ym Any thoughts on this?

I am the Flink Jira Bot and I help the community manage its development. I see this issues has been marked as Major but is unassigned and neither itself nor its Sub-Tasks have been updated for 60 days. I have gone ahead and added a "stale-major" to the issue". If this ticket is a Major, please either assign yourself or give an update. Afterwards, please remove the label or in 7 days the issue will be deprioritized.

This issue was labeled "stale-major" 7 days ago and has not received any updates so it is being deprioritized. If this ticket is actually Major, please raise the priority and ask a committer to assign you the issue or revive the public discussion.

Judging from the latest exceptions, they are all caused by timeouts (testDiscardOnTimeout will trigger assert exceptions after timeouts).

There is no problem with the normal execution of testDiscardOnTimeout, but as long as there is an exception in the RetryingExecutor, it will swallow the exception and cause a timeout, which will further cause an assert exception. This can be reproduced by manually throwing an exception.

I think we could add exception handling logic to handleFailure when the testDiscardOnTimeout is executed, so that we can see the root cause of the exception next time.

Add exception handling logic via abbb5131ba644c5f585e5ba9721720bdb00fcd21.

Hope we can see the root cause next time.

This appeared as part of the GHA migration work of FLINK-27075 in GHA: https://github.com/XComp/flink/actions/runs/6958423183/job/18933846995#step:12:10409

occurance of the same issue in a private build with the same stack traces as https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/FLINK-26515?focusedCommentId=17760292&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-17760292

Fix merged into master as fc60d176e3ad7f06a93ebb37da491737f196fbe6..7d6cdc5e5b97db6ac9daf8636fe1873765479246,
into 1.19 as 4069d87c33333b5e7281923d8d7fddeb83703c9b..b4767aeeebcb482584ddd70dfcd329a2a2c4ff03,
into 1.18 as f3625bc87faa8ff9020e95d8083b22f197391feb..febdaeeda5117f54dcb7fa8f8e9802eb9fd2898e
